tool_description: Get detailed facts for every cat breed. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/cats.

api_list.name: /v1/cats
api_list.description: API Ninjas Cats API endpoint for retrieving information about various cat breeds.

optional_parameters.name: playfulness
optional_parameters.description: How playful the cat is. Possible values: 0 (serious) to 5 (maximum playfulness).

optional_parameters.name: grooming
optional_parameters.description: How much work is required to properly groom the cat. Possible values: 0 (maximum effort) to 5 (minimum effort).

optional_parameters.name: family_friendly
optional_parameters.description: How affectionate the cat is to family. Possible values: 0 (minimal affection) to 5 (maximum affection).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to offset for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: children_friendly
optional_parameters.description: How well the cat gets along with children. Possible values: 0 (not friendly) to 5 (very friendly).

optional_parameters.name: other_pets_friendly
optional_parameters.description: How well the cat gets along with other pets. Possible values: 0 (not friendly) to 5 (very friendly).

optional_parameters.name: shedding
optional_parameters.description: How much hair the cat sheds. Possible values: 0 (no shedding) to 5 (maximum shedding).

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the cat breed.
